response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance for both parties involved. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exclusive price of $14,500, reflecting my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your considerations, and we can proceed to finalize the details.", "product_price": 14500}
